heading: Rebate for bicycle storage facilities
text:
Except for R-3 occupancy, owners who demonstrate that they have
     provided secured indoor bicycling facilities accessible to all building occupants may be rebated their fees as set out in rul e.
     Such facilities shall be identified on approved plans and shall be noted on the certificate of occupancy with a statement that
     the bicycling accommodations dedicated to such facilities were provided in accordance with this section.
